posts.title: HEXO_building
posts.text: hexo d出现问题纠正方法2021年8月之后github不再支持使用用户名和密码来推送，所以只能改成其他方式 这里我选用的是Token，而不是SSH。 Token方法创建个人Token个人github主页->settings->Developer Settings->Personal access tokens->Token(classic)->Generate new token->将选项都打上对勾->generate->将Token记录 repo部分更新为repo: https://<token>@github.com/<username>/<username>.github.io.git 问题喜+1： 123error: RPC failed; HTTP 408 curl 22 The requested URL returned error: 408send-pack: unexpected disconnect while reading sideband packetfatal: the remote end hung up unexpectedly Don’t worry! Just without magic.[关魔法重新hexo d]问题喜+2: 1Failed to connect to github.com port 443 after 21094 ms: Couldn't connect to server Don’t worry! Just open the magic.[开魔法重新hexo d] 暂时还没遇见过两个问题都出现的情况。也许换个变化系魔法有用。 Hopefully help you!
posts.raw:
---
title: HEXO_building
date: 2023-08-10 14:23:26
tags: HEXO
---

## hexo d出现问题纠正方法

2021年8月之后github不再支持使用用户名和密码来推送，所以只能改成其他方式

这里我选用的是Token，而不是SSH。

### Token方法

创建个人Token
`个人github主页->settings->Developer Settings->Personal access tokens->Token(classic)->Generate new token->将选项都打上对勾->generate->将Token记录`

repo部分更新为
`repo: https://<token>@github.com/<username>/<username>.github.io.git`

**问题喜+1：**
```shell
error: RPC failed; HTTP 408 curl 22 The requested URL returned error: 408
send-pack: unexpected disconnect while reading sideband packet
fatal: the remote end hung up unexpectedly
```
Don't worry! Just without magic.[关魔法重新hexo d]
**问题喜+2:**
```shell
Failed to connect to github.com port 443 after 21094 ms: Couldn't connect to server
```
Don't worry! Just open the magic.[开魔法重新hexo d]

暂时还没遇见过两个问题都出现的情况。也许换个变化系魔法有用。

Hopefully help you!
posts.content:
hexo d出现问题纠正方法

2021年8月之后github不再支持使用用户名和密码来推送，所以只能改成其他方式

这里我选用的是Token，而不是SSH。

Token方法

创建个人Token
个人github主页->settings->Developer Settings->Personal access tokens->Token(classic)->Generate new token->将选项都打上对勾->generate->将Token记录

repo部分更新为
repo: https://<token>@github.com/<username>/<username>.github.io.git

问题喜+1：

Don’t worry! Just without magic.[关魔法重新hexo d]
问题喜+2:

Don’t worry! Just open the magic.[开魔法重新hexo d]

暂时还没遇见过两个问题都出现的情况。也许换个变化系魔法有用。

Hopefully help you!

If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post12$ hexo new [layout] <title>$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files用于生成静态文件 1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sitesDeploy就是推送 1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
posts.raw:
---
title: Hello World
---
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new [layout] <title>
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files
用于生成静态文件
``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites
Deploy就是推送
``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)
